Package controller

Class StaffApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.StaffApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayStaffPage, DisplayUserPage, MainDisplayPage
    public class StaffApp
extends java.lang.Object
implements DisplayStaffPage, DisplayUserPage
    A control class that will handle methods relating to the staff module. It will manage and control objects that are necessary to allow the staff to login, create/update/remove movie listing, create/update/remove cinema showtimes and the movies to be shown, and configure system settings.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lim Wai Leong, Oh Jun Teng

      • createShowtimes

        public static void createShowtimes()
        Creates a Showtime object for every showtime entry in the database.

      • createStaff

        public static void createStaff​(java.lang.String username,
                               java.lang.String password)
        Creates a staff account so staff can login and saves login info to staffdatabase.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of staff
        password - Password of staff

      • login

        public static int login​(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
        Checks login information against staffdatabase.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of staff
        password - Password of staff
        Returns:
        0 if all information matches. Returns -1 if password does not match. Returns -2 if no such username exists.

      • createCineplexAndCinemas

        public static void createCineplexAndCinemas()
        Creates all the pre-existing Cineplex and Cinema objects necessary for the program to continue. Add the created objects to the relevant public static ArrayList for other methods to access.

      • createMovie

        public static void createMovie​(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String showingStatus,
                               java.lang.String synopsis,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cast,
                               java.lang.String director,
                               java.lang.String type,
                               java.lang.String movieRating)
        Creates a Movie object. Adds the newly created object to movieArr. Adds the movie with all relevent details into moviedatabase.
        Parameters:
        name - Movie title
        showingStatus - Status can be Coming Soon, Preview, Now Showing, End Of Showing
        synopsis - Synopsis of movie
        cast - Cast of movie
        director - Director of movie
        type - Genre of movie. Eg. Action, adventure, etc.
        movieRating - Rating of move. Eg. PG13, PG, etc

      • editMovieStringDetails

        public static void editMovieStringDetails​(int selection,
                                          java.lang.String moviename,
                                          java.lang.String change)
        Edits movie details (title, type, showing status, synopsis, rating, director, cast list) in the moviedatabase. Uses selection to determine what attribute to alter.
        Parameters:
        selection - Selection of what to edit
        moviename - Name of movie to edit
        change - The change to be implemented.

      • movieExists

        public static boolean movieExists​(java.lang.String title)
        Checks that movie exists in moviedatabase when given title of movie.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of movie.
        Returns:
        boolean value true if exists, false if not.

      • createShowtime

        public static void createShowtime​(java.lang.String cinemaID,
                                  java.lang.String timing,
                                  java.lang.String movietitle)
        Takes in cinemeID, timing and movietitle. If cinemaID does not exists, prints error message and returns. Else, fetches the relevant cinema object and feeds into constructor of showtime object. Adds new showtime object to showtimeArr. Adds new showtime object to showtimedatabase. Adds showtimeID to moviedatabase for the relevant movie.
        Parameters:
        cinemaID - Cinema where showtime will be
        timing - Timing for showtime
        movietitle - Title of movie to be showed in this showtime object

      • updateShowtimes

        public static void updateShowtimes​(java.lang.String showtimeID,
                                   java.lang.String cinemaID,
                                   java.lang.String movietitle,
                                   java.lang.String timing)
        Updates Showtime with new attributes.
        Parameters:
        showtimeID - Unique ID for showtime
        cinemaID - Unique ID for cinema
        movietitle - Title of movie in showtime to be updated
        timing - Timing of showtime to be updated

      • configureTicketprice

        public static void configureTicketprice​(int selection,
                                        Price p,
                                        double newPrice)
        Uses selection to determine what to change.
        Parameters:
        selection - Selection of which type of price to change.
        p - Object Price to be changed.
        newPrice - New price to be set.

      • configureDates

        public static void configureDates​(int selection,
                                  java.lang.String date,
                                  Calendar c)
        Parameters:
        selection - Choice of what kind of date to add. "0" for holiday date, "1" for weekend date.
        date - date to be added to the calendar. Should be in String format YYYYMMDD.
        c - Calendar object date is to be added to.

      • showTopMovies

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> showTopMovies​(int selection)
        Depending on selection, returns top 5 movies.
        Parameters:
        selection - Selection of which sort to return.
        Returns:
        If selection == 1, returns sorted by overall rating. If selection == 2, returns sorted by total sales.

      • createCalendar

        public static Calendar createCalendar()
        Creates special dates that have special prices. Ie. holday dates and weekend dates.
        Returns:
        calendar object

      • searchShowtimes

        public static java.lang.String[] searchShowtimes()
        Iterates through showtimeArr to return list of showtime information.
        In format: ShowtimeID: ______ |Cinema: _______ |Timing: ______
        Returns:
        List of showtime information as formatted above.
